song_lyrics: Zīnī re zīnī, ye Sahajānand ras-bhīnī,
Yagnapuruṣhjīne oḍhaī chadariyā, Yogījīne āshiṣh dīnī,
Ye chādar me divya rang hai,
Brahmavid āpnoti param, brahmavid brahma ev bhavati ।
Brahma chadariyā jo koī oḍhe, sharan Sant kī līnī,
Ye Sahajānand ras-bhīnī, chadariyā zīnī re zīnī...
title: Sahajānand ras-bhīnī chadariyā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1187: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
